thread.title: Watch: Minzy Teases Soaring Ballad For "Rebel: Thief Whole Stole The People" OST | Soompi
thread.title_full: Watch: Minzy Teases Soaring Ballad For "Rebel: Thief Whole Stole The People" OST | Soompi

author: J. Lim
title: Watch: Minzy Teases Soaring Ballad For "Rebel: Thief Whole Stole The People" OST | Soompi
text:
Shares 321 Display.Sharethrough.Soompi.1x1 
Minzy is set to kick off her solo activities with the release of her OST for MBC’s “ Rebel: Thief Who Stole the People ,” and we’ve been given a short preview of what we can expect! 
Minzy will be performing a soaring ballad titled “I Wanted to Love,” and she will be joining others like Jeon In Kwon, Ahn Ye Eun, and Yoo Seung Eun as the fourth in the drama’s OST lineup . 
The video features a snippet of the upcoming song, showing both clips from the drama as well as video footage of Minzy recording the song. There is also a short message from Minzy promoting the drama at the end. 
The drama airs every Monday and Tuesday at 10:00 p.m. KST. Catch up with the latest episode of the drama below! 
Are you excited to hear the full song from Minzy?
